step_feedback.feedback: You performed the shoulder blade squeeze well in the first step.  Keep focusing on the circular motion and deep breaths.
In step 2, try to maintain a smoother circular motion.  Focus on keeping your shoulders relaxed and avoid jerky movements.
Step 3 shows some inconsistency. Remember to keep the movement controlled and circular, and breathe deeply throughout.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the shoulder rolls exercise! Remember to squeeze your shoulder blades together and move them in a smooth circle.  Focus on deep breaths to help with the movement and lymphatic flow. Let's work on consistency in the next session.
